thread.title: Javi Marroquin Defends Tyler Baltierra In Cheating Scandal: ‘He’s Madly In Love!’
thread.title_full: Javi Marroquin Defends Tyler Baltierra In Cheating Scandal: ‘He’s Madly In Love!’

author: Teresa Roca
title: Javi Marroquin Defends Tyler Baltierra In Cheating Scandal: ‘He’s Madly In Love!’
text:
Tyler Baltierra has been accused of cheating on wife Catelynn Lowell – and his Teen Mom family is coming to his defense! Teen Mom stars Javi Marroquin and Matt Baier are telling all on the scandal exclusively told RadarOnline.com.
Baltierra and Lowell addressed cheating rumors after the site Crazy Days and Nights reported that MTV “turned a blind eye to the cheating” because it didn’t “fit in the storyline for this season for the couple .”
“Well since it’s out in the open @TylerBaltierra did cheat on me. He’s busted,” Lowell tweeted, as her husband jokingly replied, “Damn it! We really tried keeping that a secret too! Well I’m sorry, I couldn’t resist her/him… idk it was dark and I was drunk.”
PHOTOS: Wet & Wild West! Kanye Shockingly Jumps Into A Lake During Free Outdoor Show In Armenia, Hundreds Of Fans Follow 
Marroquin exclusively told Radar of the bombshell, “I doubt it’s true, those two are madly in love. I hope it’s not, I love those two together!”
Amber Portwood ’s fiancé Baier exclusively added, “It’s absolutely not true! That would never happen.”
As Radar readers know, the couple has experienced marital issues on the most recent season of the show.
Even though Lowell entered rehab to battle her depression and anxiety, her husband slammed her when she returned to her old ways.
PHOTOS: The Feud Continues! Kelly Writes Cryptic Tweet Allegedly Aimed At Giuliana: ‘Liars Always Get Caught ’ 
“You know what Cate? You better figure something out soon,” he said. “Listen, if you go into this thing again I got to check out. I’ll get hardened. I’ll close everyone off. It’s safe that way .”
Although Baltierra hasn’t posted a photo with his wife in nearly three months, he confirmed that they’re still together.
“I love you,” he tweeted amid the cheating rumors.
Do you think Baltierra was unfaithful? Tell us in the comments!
We pay for juicy info! Do you have a story for RadarOnline.com? Email us at tips@radaronline.com, or call us at (866) ON-RADAR (667-2327) any time, day or night.
